adjustReputation(uint256,bool).details: Adjust the reputation of a user based on the voting result

params._approved: True if the course is approved, false otherwise

finalizeCourse(uint256).details: Finalize a course by approving or rejecting it

getCourse(uint256).details: Get a course from its ID

getCourses(address).details: Get the courses submitted by a user

getCreator(uint256).details: Get the creator of a course

getCreatorByAddress(address).details: Get the creator of a course

getCreatorNumberOfCourses(address).details: Get the creator number of courses

getNumberOfCourses(address).details: Get the number of courses submitted by a user

getVotingPeriod(address).details: Check voting period duration based on user grade

hasVoted(uint256,address).details: Check if a user has voted for a course

returns._0: True if the user has voted, false otherwise

submitCourse(string,string,uint256).details: Submit a course to the collective intelligence

params._ipfsHash: The IPFS hash of the course
params._voteEndTime: The end time of the voting period

params.trotelcoinstaking: The address of the trotelcoin staking

params._vote: The vote (true for approve, false for reject)

params._feeCollector: The address of the fee collector
